title: Why the hell am I BRONZE 4 RIOT FROM SILVER 5 TO BRONZE 4
body: I worked my Fucking ass off to get to silver 5 spent so long lost so much for this game spent SO MUCH on this fucked up game and i LOST 3 GAMES OUT OF 10 AND I GET PUT IN BRONZE 4 FK U PPL SUCK BALLS. Thx for reading this u sad dogs..

replies.body: Well, it more depends on who you verse in promos than how many games out of ten you win. You have no control over that.
Won 6/10 bronze 5 welcome to elo hell buddy

Oh i know why you're bronze 4
because you're garbage.

dont blame riot for you not being good.
if silver 5 meant that much to you then dont play more to lose it.
furthermore this is help & support page, for technical issues. not your %%%%%fit
